participant_1.background:
I like to give them sassy sounding names that actually help people think nice things.
I think dogs could learn to read if they were trained well.
I have a few pet iguanas.
I have a brother but we don t talk much yet.

participant_2.background:
I spend an hour getting ready in the morning.
I can t stand clutter or dust.
I still love my cat despite all this.
I have horrible allergies.
When i shower my skin is nearly red from how hard i scrub.

content.text: Hi, I'm [user 1's name].
Hi, I'm [user 2's name].
What do you do for fun?
I like to go on long walks, clean my house, and play with my cat.
I like to go on walks too, but I don't have a cat. I have a few pet iguanas.
Iguanas! That's so cool. I've never seen one in real life.
They're really neat animals. They're very smart and they can learn to do tricks.
That's amazing. I've always wanted to have a pet that I could train.
Iguanas are great pets, but they do require a lot of care. They need a big enclosure, a heat lamp, and a lot of attention.
I think I'd be up for the challenge. I love animals.
Well, if you ever decide to get an iguana, I'd be happy to give you some tips on how to take care of it.
That's really kind of you. Thank you.
No problem. So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and listen to music.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books, movies, and music?

I like to read a lot of different genres, but I'm a big fan of fantasy and sci-fi. My favorite movies are the Lord of the Rings trilogy and the Harry Potter series. And I listen to a lot of different types of music, but my favorite bands are The Beatles, Pink Floyd, and Queen.
Wow, we have a lot in common! I love all of those books, movies, and bands too.
That's awesome! I'm glad we're getting along so well.
Me too! This is the best conversation I've had in a long time.
Me too! I'm so glad I met you.
Me too!
